sentence: Ms. BONAMICI. Madam Chair, last week, I had five townhall meetings  across northwest Oregon in urban, suburban, and rural areas. Not one  person, not one of the thousands who attended, asked me to support a  budget that cuts Medicaid, gives tax breaks to the wealthiest, raises  the…
